text: A Walk Among the Tombstones is a 2014 American neo-noir crime film written and directed by Scott Frank, and based on the eponymous 1992 novel of the same name by Lawrence Block. It stars Liam Neeson, Dan Stevens, David Harbour, Brian Bradley, and Boyd Holbrook. A Walk Among the Tombstones was released on September 19, 2014. Critical reception was mixed and the film grossed $62 million worldwide.
